alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 1:35PM MST until November 09 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations around 1 inch tonight. Then additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches on Tuesday and another 1 to 3 inches on Wednesday. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains, Helena Valley, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, Cascade County below 5000ft and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass; Western and Central Chouteau County
